data.message:
This looks great. Hope I never have to use it but I'm glad the feature is there. 
Now how do I make the app stop asking me do I know all these random people that I don't know and don't want to know?????

replies.message: Thank you, VA. Keeping you connected with your loved ones is important to us! If you're seeing people listed in "People You May Know" that you don't actually know in real life, please let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1B9LXXw. We hope that helps! -Rose
